sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthemplyrinfochangedtls ( emplyr_id , change_de , orgnzt_id , group_id , empl_no , sexdstn_code , brthdy , fxnum , house_adres , house_end_telno , area_no , detail_adres , zip , offm_telno , mbtlnum , email_adres , house_middle_telno , pstinst_code , emplyr_sttus_code , esntl_id ) VALUES ( #emplyrId# , #changeDe# , #orgnztId# , #groupId# , #emplNo# , #sexdstnCode# , #brthdy# , #fxnum# , #houseAdres# , #houseEndTelno# , #areaNo# , #detailAdres# , #zip# , #offmTelno# , #mbtlnum# , #emailAdres# , #houseMiddleTelno# , #pstinstCode# , #emplyrSttusCode# , #esntlId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthemplyrinfochangedtls SET emplyr_id = #emplyrId# , change_de = #changeDe# , orgnzt_id = #orgnztId# , group_id = #groupId# , empl_no = #emplNo# , sexdstn_code = #sexdstnCode# , brthdy = #brthdy# , fxnum = #fxnum# , house_adres = #houseAdres# , house_end_telno = #houseEndTelno# , area_no = #areaNo# , detail_adres = #detailAdres# , zip = #zip# , offm_telno = #offmTelno# , mbtlnum = #mbtlnum# , email_adres = #emailAdres# , house_middle_telno = #houseMiddleTelno# , pstinst_code = #pstinstCode# , emplyr_sttus_code = #emplyrSttusCode# , esntl_id = #esntlId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId# AND change_de = #changeDe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comthemplyrinfochangedtls WHERE 1 = 1 AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId# AND change_de = #changeDe#
sqlMap.select: SELECT emplyr_id , change_de , orgnzt_id , group_id , empl_no , sexdstn_code , brthdy , fxnum , house_adres , house_end_telno , area_no , detail_adres , zip , offm_telno , mbtlnum , email_adres , house_middle_telno , pstinst_code , emplyr_sttus_code , esntl_id FROM COMTHEMPLYRINFOCHANGEDTLS WHERE emplyr_id = #emplyrId# AND change_de = #changeDe#

SELECT A.EMPLYR_ID , A.CHANGE_DE , A.ORGNZT_ID , A.GROUP_ID , A.EMPL_NO , A.SEXDSTN_CODE , A.BRTHDY , A.FXNUM , A.HOUSE_ADRES , A.HOUSE_END_TELNO , A.AREA_NO , A.DETAIL_ADRES , A.ZIP , A.OFFM_TELNO , A.MBTLNUM , A.EMAIL_ADRES , A.HOUSE_MIDDLE_TELNO , A.PSTINST_CODE , A.EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE , A.ESNTL_ID FROM ( SELECT EMPLYR_ID , CHANGE_DE , ORGNZT_ID , GROUP_ID , EMPL_NO , SEXDSTN_CODE , BRTHDY , FXNUM , HOUSE_ADRES , HOUSE_END_TELNO , AREA_NO , DETAIL_ADRES , ZIP , OFFM_TELNO , MBTLNUM , EMAIL_ADRES , HOUSE_MIDDLE_TELNO , PSTINST_CODE , EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE , ESNTL_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTHEMPLYRINFOCHANGEDTLS WHERE 1=1
EMPLYR_ID = #searchKeyword#
CHANGE_DE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY EMPLYR_ID DESC , CHANGE_DE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTHEMPLYRINFOCHANGEDTLS WHERE 1=1
EMPLYR_ID = #searchKeyword#
CHANGE_DE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
